page.title: 02HEYBROOK SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Saira. I have been in this school for six years.This school was built 85 years ago.It is made from red bricks. This school has 3 floors.I am on the middle floor.We can get to the middle floors by slopes.There are ropes on the walls instead of hand rails.On the middle floor there is also the M6 Theatre Company.In our school there are 15 classrooms. there is also a Remedial Reading room.Children from other schools come to read in our Remedial Reading room. In our school we had a home safety competition, and we won.We won Â£50 and a shield.Some children went to see the Mayor. In our school there are some children fasting.Fasting is a part of the Muslim Religion.Eid is a Muslim Celebration.This is when people wear nice clothes,jewellery and make-up.
